title: Krayzie_Bone-Chasing_The_Devil-(2015)
description:
Krayzie Boneâ€™s new album Chasing The Devil has been getting pushed back for several years now but the legendary Bone Thugs-N-Harmony rapper to drop his new project on November 20th. It's produced by Tech N9ne, Layzie Bone and DJ Quik, among others. The first official single is "Cloudy". Support him and buy his new album, out NOW!
